recipes.text:
DIRECTIONS
----------
(See notes on Evernote)
1. Preheat oven to 300 F. Grease a 10 inch round cake pan.
2. In a small saucepan over medium heat dissolve the salt and sugar in the water.
3. In a double boiler (or in a microwave, stirring every 30 seconds) melt the chocolate.
4. Cut the butter into pieces and beat the butter into the chocolate, one piece at a time.
5. Beat in the hot sugar water.
6. Slowly beat in the eggs, one at a time.
7. Pour the batter into the prepared pan.
8. Bake in a hot water bath for 30-45 minutes. Remove from oven before center looks fully cooked.
9. Chill overnight. Dip cake pan in hot water to release cake before turning over on to a plate. Return to refrigerator or freezer for an hour before dusting with powdered sugar, if desired.
recipes.name: Flourless Chocolate Cake

recipes.text:
1) Preheat the oven to 350Â°F. Lightly grease two 3 1/4" x 5 3/4" mini loaf pans, or one 9" x 5" loaf pan.

2) Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, and cocoa.

3) In a separate bowl, beat the butter and sugar until light and creamy.

4) Beat in the egg, then stir in the vanilla, banana, and sour cream.

5) Gently mix in the dry ingredients and chocolate chips until well incorporated.

6) Pour the batter into the pan(s) and bake for 45 to 60 minutes (bake for the shorter time for two mini loaves and the longer time for the larger loaf), until a cake tester or toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.

7) Remove the bread(s) from the oven, and allow to rest in the pan(s) for 10 minutes. Turn the bread(s) out onto a rack to cool completely.

Yield: one 9" x 5" loaf or two mini loaves.
ingredients: tablespoons King Arthur All-Purpose Baking Cocoa, or Dutch-process cocoa
semisweet chocolate chips, chocolate mini chips preferred
recipes.name: Aunt Dora's Banana Bread

recipes.text:
1. Preheat oven to 375
2. Combine the dry ingredients into a bowl
3. In a separate bowl mix the two sugars and butter
4. Once they are mixed put in the egg and vanilla and mix
5. Then gradually add the dry ingredients to the mix
6. Once well mixed add the chips

recipes.name: Flourless Chocolate Cake

recipes.text:
DIRECTIONS
----------
1. Simmer cream, milk, sugar and salt until sugar dissolves.

2. Slowly whisk 1/3 of the milk into the yolks, then mix the yolk mixture baack into the pot of cream.

3. Heat the milk and egg mixture to 170 F.

4. Chill mixture overnight.

5. Combine milk and flavoring in ice cream machine.


COMMENTS
--------
7/20/14
Made this for the first time in the Magic Mill. The ice cream was very smooth and creamy, and firms up much faster than the recipe without eggs. Remember that flavors tend to dull when they are frozen.
recipes.name: Ice Cream with Eggs
